```{r}
remotes::install_github("carmonalab/SignatuR")
library(SignatuR)
```

Add signatures to existing DB

```{r}
#M1 signature from Martinez et al. (https://journals.aai.org/jimmunol/article/177/10/7303/74645)
sig <- read.csv("data-raw/Martinez_M1M2_macro.csv")
M1 <- sig[sig$Type == "M1","Gene"]
M2 <- sig[sig$Type == "M2","Gene"]
```

```{r}
SignatuR <- AddSignature(SignatuR,
	node=SignatuR$Hs$Programs,
	name="M1_macrophage",
	reference="Martinez et al. (2006) JI",
	signature=M1)

SignatuR <- AddSignature(SignatuR,
	node=SignatuR$Hs$Programs,
	name="M2_macrophage",
	reference="Martinez et al. (2006) JI",
	signature=M2)

print(SignatuR, "Reference","Signature")
```


```{r}
# Save updated database
usethis::use_data(SignatuR, overwrite = TRUE)

```
